data.lyric:
[ti:Renegade (feat. Taylor Swift)]
[ar:Big Red Machine/Taylor Swift]
[al:Renegade (feat. Taylor Swift)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Renegade (feat. Taylor Swift) - Big Red Machine/Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:04.35]Lyrics by：Aaron Dessner/Taylor Swift
[00:08.70]Composed by：Aaron Dessner/Taylor Swift
[00:13.05]I tapped on your window on your darkest night
[00:15.84]The shape of you
[00:16.93]
[00:17.54]Was jagged and weak
[00:19.25]There was nowhere for me to stay
[00:21.86]
[00:22.54]But I stayed anyway
[00:24.65]And if I would've known
[00:26.40]How many pieces you had crumbled into
[00:29.75]
[00:31.12]I might have let them lay
[00:33.66]Are you really gonna talk about timing
[00:36.14]In times like these
[00:37.59]And let all your damage
[00:39.09]Damage me
[00:40.40]Carry your baggage up my street
[00:43.17]And make me your future history
[00:46.28]It's time you've come a long way
[00:49.01]Open the blinds
[00:50.08]Let me see your face
[00:51.73]You wouldn't be the first renegade
[00:54.65]To need somebody
[00:56.65]
[00:58.74]Is it insensitive for me to say
[01:02.65]Get your s**t together
[01:05.14]
[01:06.06]So I can love you
[01:08.29]
[01:09.69]Is it really your anxiety
[01:12.79]That stops you from giving me everything
[01:17.09]Or do you just not want to
[01:20.18]
[01:21.68]I tapped on your window on your darkest night
[01:24.48]The shape of you
[01:25.57]
[01:26.10]Was jagged and weak
[01:27.33]
[01:28.06]There was nowhere for me to stay
[01:30.30]
[01:31.09]But I stayed anyway
[01:33.10]You fire off missiles cause
[01:34.68]You hate yourself
[01:35.72]But do you know you're demolishing me
[01:38.58]
[01:39.19]Then you squeeze my hand
[01:40.55]As I'm about to leave
[01:42.28]Are you really gonna talk about timing
[01:44.58]In times like these
[01:46.18]And let all your damage
[01:47.59]Damage me
[01:48.94]Carry your baggage up my street
[01:51.63]And make me your future history
[01:54.93]It's time you've come a long way
[01:57.58]Open the blinds
[01:58.72]Let me see your face
[02:00.29]You wouldn't be the first renegade
[02:03.26]To need somebody
[02:04.91]
[02:07.33]Is it insensitive for me to say
[02:11.23]Get your s**t together
[02:13.70]
[02:14.61]So I can love you
[02:16.68]
[02:18.37]Is it really your anxiety
[02:21.68]That stops you from giving me everything
[02:25.72]Or do you just not want to
[02:28.73]
[02:53.30]And if I would've known
[02:54.91]How sharp the pieces were
[02:56.50]You'd crumbled into
[02:58.17]
[02:59.57]I might've let them lay
[03:02.14]Are you really gonna talk about timing
[03:04.39]In times like these
[03:06.12]And let all your damage
[03:07.58]Damage me
[03:08.89]Carry your baggage up my street
[03:11.77]And make me your future history
[03:15.39]It's time you've come a long way
[03:17.52]Open the blinds
[03:18.61]Let me see your face
[03:20.38]You wouldn't be the first renegade
[03:23.20]To need somebody
[03:24.98]
[03:26.10]To need somebody
[03:28.07]
[03:28.97]To need somebody
[03:31.82]To need somebody
[03:35.18]To need
[03:35.81]
[03:36.59]Are you really gonna talk about timing
[03:38.88]Is it insensitive for me to say
[03:41.83]In times like these and let all your damage damage me
[03:43.62]Get your s**t together
[03:45.30]Carry your baggage up my street
[03:46.31]So I can love you
[03:47.65]And make me your future history
[03:49.80]Is it really your anxiety
[03:51.31]It's time you've come a long way open the blinds
[03:53.02]That stops you from giving me everything
[03:55.54]Let me see your face you wouldn't be the first renegade
[03:57.21]To need somebody
[03:57.76]Or do you just not want to
data.trans:
[ti:Renegade (feat. Taylor Swift)]
[ar:Big Red Machine/Taylor Swift]
[al:Renegade (feat. Taylor Swift)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.35]//
[00:08.70]//
[00:13.05]于最暗的夜 轻敲你的窗
[00:15.84]你的身影
[00:16.93]
[00:17.54]那般朦胧 那般单薄
[00:19.25]这世界似乎并无我的容身之所
[00:21.86]
[00:22.54]而我依然选择留下
[00:24.65]若我早些醒悟 不再孤注一掷
[00:26.40]你是否不会那般心碎？
[00:29.75]
[00:31.12]或许我该置之不理吧
[00:33.66]你真的要像这般大谈特谈
[00:36.14]一切不过是源于缘分未到
[00:37.59]任你所遭受的伤害
[00:39.09]肆意倾注于我
[00:40.40]收拾行囊离开我的世界吧
[00:43.17]而我不过是你人生之旅的过客而已
[00:46.28]此时此刻 你已是遥不可及
[00:49.01]打开百叶窗
[00:50.08]就让我再看看你的脸
[00:51.73]你并不是另觅新欢
[00:54.65]选择背叛于我的先例
[00:56.65]
[00:58.74]一句 重新振作
[01:02.65]是否显得太过凉薄？
[01:05.14]
[01:06.06]只是这样我才能继续爱你
[01:08.29]
[01:09.69]是否真的只是因为你的焦虑不安
[01:12.79]让你不愿倾尽所有
[01:17.09]抑或是你本不愿如此？
[01:20.18]
[01:21.68]于最暗的夜 轻敲你的窗
[01:24.48]你的身影
[01:25.57]
[01:26.10]那般朦胧 那般单薄
[01:27.33]
[01:28.06]这世界似乎并无我的容身之所
[01:30.30]
[01:31.09]而我依然选择留下
[01:33.10]你的大发雷霆
[01:34.68]不过是因为你讨厌这样的自己
[01:35.72]而你是否清楚与此同时你也在伤害我？
[01:38.58]
[01:39.19]只是在我转身离开的那刻
[01:40.55]你却紧握着我的手
[01:42.28]你真的要像这般大谈特谈
[01:44.58]一切只是起源于缘分未到
[01:46.18]任你所遭受的伤害
[01:47.59]肆意倾注于我
[01:48.94]收拾行囊离开我的世界吧
[01:51.63]而我不过是你人生之旅的过客而已
[01:54.93]此时此刻 你已那般遥不可及
[01:57.58]打开百叶窗
[01:58.72]就让我再看看你的脸
[02:00.29]你并不是另觅新欢
[02:03.26]选择背叛于我的先例
[02:04.91]
[02:07.33]一句 重新振作
[02:11.23]是否显得太过凉薄？
[02:13.70]
[02:14.61]只是这样我才能继续爱你
[02:16.68]
[02:18.37]是否真的只是因为你的焦虑不安
[02:21.68]让你不愿倾尽所有
[02:25.72]抑或是你本不愿如此？
[02:28.73]
[02:53.30]若我早些醒悟 不再孤注一掷

[02:58.17]

[03:04.39]一切只是起源于缘分未到

[03:07.58]肆意倾注于我

[03:11.77]而我不过是你人生之旅的过客而已
